rules: Rule1: Provided that there is equipment failure on the job for the material, extraction of the material in the region is not active.
Rule2: If there is a safety violation on the job for the material, then extraction of the material in the region is not active.
Rule3: Whenever the job for the material is suspended, the job for the material is completed.
Rule4: Under the condition that the job for the material is suspended, the job for the material is extended.
Rule5: Either the job for the material is suspended, or there is equipment failure on the job for the material, or there is a safety violation on the job for the material.
Rule6: Provided that there is a strike on the job for the material, the job for the material is not suspended.
Rule7: A strike occurs on the job for the material, or an accident occurs on the job for the material.
Rule8: If there has been an accident on the job for the material, then there is an injury on the job for the material.
Rule9: Either there is a union meeting on the job for the material, or if there has been an accident on the job for the material, then the job for the material is not suspended.
Rule10: Whenever the material in the region is depleted, the material has not been mined in the region.
Rule11: If the material has been discovered in the region, then the material has not been mined in the region.
Rule12: If the region has a high yield of the material, then whenever the region has been surveyed for the material, if the region has a deposit of the material, the material is valuable.
Rule13: Under the condition that the region has a moderate yield of the material, the region has a low yield of the material.
Rule14: Whenever there is a fatality on the job for the material, the job for the material is not suspended.
Rule15: Under the condition that there is an investigation on the job for the material, a report has been filed for the job concerning the material.
Rule16: Provided that a report has been filed for the job concerning the material, if there is an injury on the job for the material, there is a fatality on the job for the material.
Rule17: If the job for the material is extended, then there is overtime on the job for the material.
Rule18: Provided that there is overtime on the job for the material, the job for the material is not completed.
Rule19: Either the region has been surveyed for the material, or the material in the region has been assayed.
Rule20: Whenever the material in the region has been assayed, if the region has a deposit of the material, the material is valuable.
Rule21: Provided that the permit for the material in the region is pending, the permit for the material in the region has been denied.
Rule22: If it is not the case that either extraction of the material in the region is halted or the material is valuable, then extraction of the material in the region is active.

Rule23: If it is not the case that if the material in the region is profitable, then if the material is not valuable, the material in the region is depleted, then the material in the region is unprofitable.

Rule24: Provided that it is not the case that if the material in the region is profitable, then if the material is not valuable, the material in the region is depleted, then the material in the region is not unprofitable.

Rule25: Provided that it is not the case that if it is not the case that if the region has been surveyed for the material, then if the region has a deposit of the material, the material is valuable, then the permit for the material in the region is pending, then there is a legal dispute concerning the material in the region.

Rule26: If it is not the case that if it is not the case that if the material is not valuable, then the material has been discovered in the region, then a claim has been staked for the material in the region, then the claim has been approved for the material in the region.

Rule27: Under the condition that it is not the case that if it is not the case that if the material is not valuable, then the material has been discovered in the region, then a claim has been staked for the material in the region, then the claim has not been approved for the material in the region.
Rule28: If it is not the case that whenever the material is not valuable, the material has been discovered in the region, then a claim has not been staked for the material in the region.
Rule29: Provided that the region does not have a high yield of the material, the region has a moderate yield of the material.
Rule30: If the material is not valuable, then the material has been mined in the region.
facts: Fact1: The material in the region is profitable.
Fact2: There is an investigation on the job for the material.
Fact3: The region has a deposit of the material.
Fact4: It is not the case that there is a legal dispute concerning the material in the region.
Fact5: Extraction of the material in the region is not halted.
Fact6: There is no union meeting on the job for the material.
Fact7: The region does not have a low yield of the material.
Fact8: The permit for the material in the region has not been denied.
